channel.title: Arcidius ll Born & Bread PvM ll All Skills ll Join Now!
channel.description:
Arcidius, is a fresh 718, with a current small community of around 3-5 average daily players. Been alive around three weeks now, as the owner, I'm looking for a community to liven it up a little. I'm averaging around 3-5 Updates each day, ranging from a bug being fixed, or a slight tweaking here and there.
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/50hds8.png[/img]
Welcome to Arcidius' Advertise Page.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img]
Here's a list of Features, I've put together. - Stable Economy. - 0% Lagging issues, hosted on a 24/hour VPS. - Custom Bossing Experiences. - All skills Trainable. - RuneSpan. - Auto-Vote. - Shooting Stars. - Various Shops. - Many Donator Benefits. - Fight Caves/Kiln. - No Current Dupes. - Strict No Scamming Policy. - Revenants. - Balmung, and other various items with special Qualities. - Bird's Nest's. - Correct Character & Cape Customization - Challenging Comp Requirements. - A Welcoming and Competitive Community. - Gambling, Hosted by our Gamblers In-game. - Squeal of Fortune. (Many Great Rewards.) - Large Community Teleport. - Teleport around the World. - Lots of New & Introduced Content, - Never seen before. - Dungeoneering. - Working Slayer, with correct effects. - Advanced Agility, Barbarian & Gnome Arena's - Lava-Flow Mining. - Mining suits can be achieved. - Notice Boards, with many character Customization Options. - Artisan's Work Shop. - Butterfly Catching - Around the world. - Daily Challenges & Activities. - Many Mini-games (Crucible, Dominion Tower). - Various Training Locations. - With Unique Challenges. - Boss Battles. - New Dungeons to Explore. - More will be added soon. - Donator Panels. - Accessibility Around the World of Arcidius. - Clue Scrolls, with correct & nice Rewards. - Caskets - Dropped by all monsters. - Nice Bossing Drop Rate. - Events Hosted Daily. - The Abyss 100% like RS - Full Living Rock Caverns
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1pz5lg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eBGmu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1z5ovf6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2z8niup.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/omtm8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/f3i4io.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/63yssk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/35chb0o.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/10f0u2q.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/5xsyvl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/k37w5s.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/s498bo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2h7mjac.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/dwp9jm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/o7lea1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/rvf052.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2gy5446.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2vd40zr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/wbrzfp.png[/img]
Thanks for Reading, I'll be Adding to this, so keep Updated. All the best, Jamie.
- Video's will be coming soon.

item.title: Arcidius ll Born & Bread PvM ll All Skills ll Join Now!
item.dc:creator: @Arcidius Arcidius
item.description:
@Arcidius wrote:

Arcidius, is a fresh 718, with a current small community of around 3-5 average daily players.
Been alive around three weeks now, as the owner, I’m looking for a community to liven it up a little.
I’m averaging around 3-5 Updates each day, ranging from a bug being fixed, or a slight tweaking here and there.

Welcome to Arcidius’ Advertise Page.

Here’s a list of Features, I’ve put together.

  • Stable Economy.
  • 0% Lagging issues, hosted on a 24/hour VPS.
  • Custom Bossing Experiences.
  • All skills Trainable.
  • RuneSpan.
  • Auto-Vote.
  • Shooting Stars.
  • Various Shops.
  • Many Donator Benefits.
  • Fight Caves/Kiln.
  • No Current Dupes.
  • Strict No Scamming Policy.
  • Revenants.
  • Balmung, and other various items with special Qualities.
  • Bird’s Nest’s.
  • Correct Character & Cape Customization
  • Challenging Comp Requirements.
  • A Welcoming and Competitive Community.
  • Gambling, Hosted by our Gamblers In-game.
  • Squeal of Fortune. (Many Great Rewards.)
  • Large Community Teleport. - Teleport around the World.
  • Lots of New & Introduced Content, - Never seen before.
  • Dungeoneering.
  • Working Slayer, with correct effects.
  • Advanced Agility, Barbarian & Gnome Arena’s
  • Lava-Flow Mining. - Mining suits can be achieved.
  • Notice Boards, with many character Customization Options.
  • Artisan’s Work Shop.
  • Butterfly Catching - Around the world.
  • Daily Challenges & Activities.
  • Many Mini-games (Crucible, Dominion Tower).
  • Various Training Locations. - With Unique Challenges.
  • Boss Battles.
  • New Dungeons to Explore.
  • More will be added soon.
  • Donator Panels.
  • Accessibility Around the World of Arcidius.
  • Clue Scrolls, with correct & nice Rewards.
  • Caskets - Dropped by all monsters.
  • Nice Bossing Drop Rate.
  • Events Hosted Daily.
  • The Abyss 100% like RS
  • Full Living Rock Caverns

Thanks for Reading, I’ll be Adding to this, so keep Updated.
All the best, Jamie.

  • Video’s will be coming soon.
